== Description ==
Retrieve the Press This bookmarklet link. This is only really useful on [[Administration Screens]].

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_shortcut_link() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (string) : The URL of the "Press This" bookmarklet.

== Examples ==
<pre>
<a href="&lt;?php echo get_shortcut_link() ?>">&lt;?php _e('Press This') ?></a>
</pre>

== Change Log ==
Since: 2.6.0

== Source File ==
<tt>get_shortcut_link()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/link-template.php}}.
